_meta.source: Researched from Mazatlán Tourism, cruise guides, and local sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers Centro Histórico, Golden Zone, El Faro

transit_routes.name: Pulmonía to Centro Histórico
transit_routes.note: Open-air taxi unique to Mazatlán. Negotiate fare before boarding.

transit_routes.name: Pulmonía to Golden Zone
transit_routes.note: Beach resort area. Hotels, restaurants, beach clubs.

transit_routes.name: Walk the Malecón
transit_routes.note: One of world's longest waterfront promenades. Sculptures, monuments.

featured_experiences.name: Centro Histórico Walking Tour
featured_experiences.note: Beautifully restored 19th-century center. Galleries, cafes, architecture.

featured_experiences.name: El Faro Lighthouse Hike
featured_experiences.note: 30-min hike up. Start early to avoid heat. One of world's highest.

featured_experiences.name: Cliff Divers at El Mirador
featured_experiences.note: Daily performances. More intimate than Acapulco. Tips expected.
